## A short undergraduate course on Probability theory in an [applied mathematics curriculum](http://master.math.u-paris.fr/annee/m1-isifar/)

This *Probability* course is a core part of [`Master ISIFAR`](http://master.math.u-paris.fr/annee/m1-mi/), a curriculum that delivers training in Statistics, Mathematical Finance, and Computer Science at [Université Paris Cité](http://u-paris.fr). The *Probability* course is related to other courses from the same curriculum.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-align: right
#| eval: false # knitr::is_html_output()
#| 
knitr::include_url("http://master.math.u-paris.fr/annee/m1-isifar/", height = '300px')
```

1.  [Statistique M1](https://master.math.u-paris.fr/modules/m1isifar-statistiques)
2.  [Mathématiques financières M1](https://master.math.u-paris.fr/modules/m1isifar-math-fi)
3.  [Mathématiques financières M2](https://master.math.u-paris.fr/modules/m2isifar-mathematiques-financieres/)
4.  [Apprentissage statistique M2](https://master.math.u-paris.fr/modules/m2isifar-apprentissage-statistique/)

This list is not exhaustive.

This course is geared towards applications. We borrow examples and applications of probability theory from statistics, computer science, big data engineering. As we have a limited amount of time, we sweep a lot of dust under the carpet. We take for granted key results from integration and measure theory. Nevertheless, we build on rigorous definitions, state and invoke theorems in a consistent way.

-   `r fontawesome::fa("link")` [Homepage of the course](https://s-v-b.github.io/MA1AY010).
-   `r fontawesome::fa("link")` [Moodle page of the course](https://moodle.u-pariscite.fr/course/view.php?id=13045).

## Prerequisites

This course builds on two Licence-level courses:

-   [Probabilités Licence 3](http://licence.math.u-paris.fr/modules/l3-maths-mfa-maths-s5-probas/)
-   [Intégration](http://licence.math.u-paris.fr/modules/l3-maths-mfa-maths-s6-Integration/)
